title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 1161/2004 of 24 June 2004 determining the extent to which applications lodged in June 2004 for import licences under the regime provided for by tariff quotas for certain products in the pigmeat sector for the period 1 July 2004 to 30 September 2004 can be accepted
header:
25.6.2004 EN Official Journal of the European Union L 224/7
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 1161/2004
of 24 June 2004
determining the extent to which applications lodged in June 2004 for import licences under the regime provided for by tariff quotas for certain products in the pigmeat sector for the period 1 July 2004 to 30 September 2004 can be accepted
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
recitals:
,
Having regard to the Treaty establishing the European Community,
Having regard to Commission Regulation (EC) No 1458/2003 of 18 August 2003 opening and providing for the administration of tariff quotas for certain products in the pigmeat sector (1), and in particular Article 5(6) thereof,
Whereas:
(1) The applications for import licences lodged for the third quarter of 2004 are for quantities less than the quantities available and can therefore be met in full.
(2) The surplus to be added to the quantity available for the following period should be determined,
main_body:
1.   Applications for import licences for the period 1 July to 30 September 2004 submitted pursuant to Regulation (EC) No 1458/2003 shall be met as referred to in Annex I.
2.   For the period 1 October to 31 December 2004, applications may be lodged pursant to Regulation (EC) No 1458/2003 for import licences for a total quantity as referred to in Annex II.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 July 2004.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 24 June 2004.
For the Commission
J. M. SILVA RODRÍGUEZ
Agriculture Director-General
(1)  OJ L 208, 19.8.2003, p. 3.
ANNEX I
Group Percentage of acceptance of import licences submitted for the period 1 July to 30 September 2004
G2 100
G3 100
G4 100
G5 100
G6 100
G7 100
ANNEX II
